name: Interfinet Technologies
tagline: IT outsourcing having global presence to serve all
description: At enfinet we believe the role of information technology is to solve problems, enhance efficiency and enable new more effective ways of delivering value to your customers. Technology should be an enabler, not an end in itself. Our skill lies in understanding your business processes, appreciating how technology can help and delivering an innovative yet economical solution.
